DOC.brief_summary: Patients NSTEMI multivessel disease schedule undergo early invasive strategy ( PCI within 72 hour ) de novo native coronary artery lesion consider recruitment study . Inclusion criterion follow : diagnosis NSTEMI accord current guideline present multivessel disease . We exclude patient cardiogenic shock presentation ( systolic blood pressure < 90 mmHg despite drug therapy ) , leave main coronary disease ( > 50 % diameter stenosis ) , previous coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) surgery , patient Syntax Score > 32 candidated by-pass surgery ( 10 ) , severe valvular heart disease unsuccessful procedure . Procedure success define achievement angiographic residual stenosis le 30 % thrombolysis myocardial infarction ( TIMI ) flow grade III PCI . Patients randomize One-Stage group completely revascularizated one time PCI , whereas patient randomize Multi-Staged group completely revascularizated time PCI , hospitalization . Patients receive clopidogrel load dose 600 mg PCI ( load dose administer 6 h prior procedure ) . Post-procedural antiplatelet regimen consist aspirin 100 mg/day indefinitely clopidogrel 75 mg/day least one month .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Different Treatment Multivessel Non ST Elevation Myocardial Infarction ( NSTEMI ) Patients : One Stage Versus Multistaged Percutaneous Coronary Intervention ( PCI )
DOC.criteria: diagnosis NSTEMI present multivessel disease patient cardiogenic shock presentation leave main coronary disease ( > 50 % diameter stenosis ) previous coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) surgery patient Syntax Score > 32 candidated bypass surgery severe valvular heart disease unsuccessful procedure
